name: 鍾仁傑
objective: 本課程講授重點為介紹零維至三維奈米材料及其生物醫學及各高科技產業的應用。內容包含合成與製備方法、先進柰米製程與奈米檢測技術，以及探討奈米材料優越的性能，包括奈米粉體、奈米碳管、奈米模板之製備，以及奈米自組裝奈米加工最新技術。
schedule:
1.Introduction of Nanotechnology & Nanomaterials
2.Properties of Nanomaterials
3.Synthesis of Nanopowders
4.Synthesis of 1-D Nanomaterials/Carbon Nanotube
5.Self Assembling Methods
6.Template Method
7.Nanofabrication
8.Characterization of Nanomaterials
9.Midterm Report
10.Potential Applications of Nanomaterials
11.Application of TiO2 Nanopowders/Photocatalysis
12.Nanomaterial for Display Applications
13.Nanomaterial for Sensor Application
14.Nanomaterial for Energy Storage Applications
15.Nanoelectronics
16.Nano-bio-technology
17.Technology roadmap of Nanotechnology & Nanomaterials
18.Final Report
